mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sum(work_amount) AS total, count(id) AS totalSb FROM pouring_base ) t1, ( SELECT sum(work_amount) AS curYear, count(id) AS totalSbY FROM pouring_base WHERE LEFT (open_time, 4) = LEFT (now(), 4) ) t2, ( SELECT sum(work_amount) AS curMonth, count(id) AS totalSbM FROM pouring_base WHERE LEFT (open_time, 7) = LEFT (now(), 7) ) t3, ( SELECT t1.c AS thermometerTotal, t2.c AS wpTotal FROM ( SELECT count(id) AS c FROM inner_temp_sensor ) t1, ( SELECT count(id) AS c FROM water_pipe ) t2 ) t4, ( SELECT count(*) AS ckTotal FROM ( SELECT cu_id, channel_no FROM water_pipe wp LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin ssb ON wp.sb_id = ssb.id WHERE is_get_water = '1' GROUP BY cu_id, channel_no ) t1 ) t5

SELECT ssb.id AS warehouseId, ssb.small_sb_no AS warehouseName, pb.open_time AS PouringStartTime, pb.pouring_strength AS PouringIntensity, pb.work_amount AS monthPouringQuantity, pb.close_time as PouringEndTime, pb.pouring_time as PouringTime, ssb.elevation_end - ssb.elevation_start as PouringPly FROM small_storage_bin ssb LEFT JOIN pouring_base pb ON pb.small_sb_id = ssb.id

SELECT * from (SELECT "出机口温度" as typeName,t1.accountability,t2.violation from (SELECT cast(sum(temperature<norm)/count(id)*100 as signed) as accountability from export_machine_temp_info) t1, (SELECT cast(sum(temperature<norm)/count(id)*100 as signed) as violation from export_machine_temp_info where date_format(time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m'))t2)t1 union ALL SELECT * from (SELECT "浇筑温度" as typeName,t1.accountability,t2.violation from (SELECT cast(sum(temperature<norm)/count(id)*100 as signed) as accountability from pouring_temp_info) t1, (SELECT cast(sum(temperature<norm)/count(id)*100 as signed) as violation from pouring_temp_info where date_format(time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m'))t2)t2 union ALL SELECT * from (SELECT "入仓温度" as typeName,t1.accountability,t2.violation from (SELECT cast(sum(temperature<norm)/count(id)*100 as signed) as accountability from inbound_temp_info) t1, (SELECT cast(sum(temperature<norm)/count(id)*100 as signed) as violation from inbound_temp_info where date_format(time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m'))t2)t3

SELECT DISTINCT ds.ds_name AS dsName, ( ssb.elevation_end - ds.elevation_start ) / ( ds.elevation_end - ds.elevation_start ) AS position, ssb.small_sb_no AS NO, ssb.elevation_start AS elevationStart, ssb.elevation_end AS elevationEnd, ssb.ds_start AS dsStart, ssb.ds_end AS dsEnd, tb3.innerTemp, tb3.time AS innerTime, pba.avg_temp AS pouringTemp, emta.avg_temp AS emtTemp, ita.avg_temp AS itaTemp, tta.top_avg_temp AS maxTemp, flow.flow AS flow, flow.time AS flowTime, pb.open_time AS openTime, pb.close_time AS endTime,
IF ( sbe.id IS NOT NULL, 4,
IF ( wp.water_begin_time > now(), 0,
IF ( pb.inter_cooling_start_time > now(), 1,
IF ( pb.second_cooling_start_time > now(), 2, 3 ) ) ) ) AS qs FROM dam_segment ds LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin ssb ON ssb.ds_start <= ds.ds_name AND ssb.ds_end >= ds.ds_name LEFT JOIN pouring_base pb ON pb.small_sb_id = ssb.id LEFT JOIN water_pipe wp ON wp.sb_id = ssb.id LEFT JOIN storage_bin_exclude sbe ON sbe.small_sb_id = ssb.id AND type = 'noColl' LEFT JOIN newest_inner_temp tb3 ON tb3.sbId = ssb.id LEFT JOIN pouring_temp_assess pba ON pba.pouring_base_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN export_machine_temp_assess emta ON emta.pouring_base_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN inbound_temp_assess ita ON ita.pouring_base_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN top_temp_assess tta ON tta.pouring_base_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN newest_flow_info flow ON flow.sbId = ssb.id ORDER BY ds.ds_name, ssb.elevation_start
SELECT type_no as typeNo,count(0) as count from alert_base GROUP BY type_no

SELECT t1.*, t2.waterFlow, t3.coolingRate FROM ( SELECT t1.*, t2.minVal, t2.maxVal FROM ( SELECT s.id AS pointId, itf.time AS time, itf.avgtemp AS curValue, itf.norm AS standardValue, s.small_sb_no AS pointName, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, p.close_time, now()) AS age FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itf LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor it ON itf.inner_temp_sensor_id = it.id LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin s ON it.sb_id = s.id LEFT JOIN pouring_base p ON s.id = p.small_sb_id WHERE s.id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) t1 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT max(time) AS time, min(temp) AS minVal, max(temp) AS maxVal, s.small_sb_no AS smallNo FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itf LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor it ON itf.inner_temp_sensor_id = it.id LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin s ON it.sb_id = s.id WHERE LEFT (time, 10) = LEFT (now(), 10) AND s.id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) t2 ON t1.pointName = t2.smallNo AND t1.time = t2.time LIMIT 1 ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tb1.sbNo AS sbNo, tb1.flow AS waterFlow, tb1.sbId AS sbId FROM ( SELECT wpi.*, s.id AS sbId, s.small_sb_no AS sbNo FROM ( SELECT wpi.* FROM water_pipe_flow_info wpi, ( SELECT water_pipe_id, max(time) AS time FROM water_pipe_flow_info WHERE to_days(time) = to_days(now()) GROUP BY water_pipe_id ) t2 WHERE wpi.water_pipe_id = t2.water_pipe_id AND wpi.time = t2.time ) wpi LEFT JOIN water_pipe wp ON wpi.water_pipe_id = wp.id LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin s ON wp.sb_id = s.id WHERE s.id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 1 ) tb1 ) t2 ON 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t2.temp - t1.temp as coolingRate FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LEFT (itf.time, 10) time, itf.avgtemp AS temp FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itf LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor it ON itf.inner_temp_sensor_id = it.id WHERE it.sb_id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TO_DAYS(itf.time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND itf.time IN ( SELECT max(itf.time) AS time FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itf LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor it ON itf.inner_temp_sensor_id = it.id WHERE it.sb_id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TO_DAYS(itf.time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY LEFT (itf.time, 10) ) ) t1, ( SELECT DISTINCT LEFT (itf.time, 10) time, itf.avgtemp AS temp FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itf LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor it ON itf.inner_temp_sensor_id = it.id WHERE it.sb_id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TO_DAYS(itf.time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) - 1 AND itf.time IN ( SELECT max(itf.time) AS time FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itf LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor it ON itf.inner_temp_sensor_id = it.id WHERE it.sb_id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TO_DAYS(itf.time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) - 1 GROUP BY LEFT (itf.time, 10) ) ) t2 ) t3 ON 1

SELECT ( SELECT max(abs(max1 - max2)) AS adjacentMaxDifference FROM ( SELECT ds_start, max(elevation_end) AS max1 FROM small_storage_bin GROUP BY ds_start ) t1, ( SELECT ds_start, max(elevation_end) AS max2 FROM small_storage_bin GROUP BY ds_start ) t2 WHERE t1.ds_start + 1 = t2.ds_start ) AS adjacentMaxDifference, min(t1.max_elevation_end) AS lowestElevation, max(t1.max_elevation_end) AS highestElevation, 2677 AS damBottomElevation, 2894 AS damTopElevation FROM ( SELECT ds_start, max(elevation_end) AS max_elevation_end FROM small_storage_bin GROUP BY ds_start ) t1, small_storage_bin t2, dam_segment t3 WHERE t1.ds_start = t2.ds_start AND t1.max_elevation_end = t2.elevation_end AND t1.ds_start = t3.ds_name

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT avg(temp) AS meanValue, cast( sum(norm > temp) / count(0) * 100 AS signed ) AS passPercent, sqrt( sum((temp - norm) *(temp - norm)) ) AS standardDeviation FROM ( SELECT t1.small_sb_no, max(t1.temp) AS temp, max(t1.norm) AS norm FROM ( SELECT its.sb_id AS small_sb_no, itsi.time, avg(itsi.temp) AS temp, max(itsi.norm) AS norm FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itsi LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor its ON itsi.inner_temp_sensor_id = its.id LEFT JOIN pouring_base pb ON pb.small_sb_id = its.sb_id LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin ssb on ssb.id = its.sb_id WHERE pb.close_time <= now() and ssb.ds_start<28 GROUP BY its.sb_id, itsi.time ) t1 GROUP BY t1.small_sb_no ) t1 ) tb1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT avg(temp) AS meanValue, cast( sum(norm > temp) / count(small_sb_no) * 100 AS signed ) AS passPercent, sqrt( sum((temp - norm) *(temp - norm)) ) AS standardDeviation FROM ( SELECT t1.small_sb_no, max(t1.temp) AS temp, max(t1.norm) AS norm FROM ( SELECT its.sb_id AS small_sb_no, itsi.time, avg(itsi.temp) AS temp, max(itsi.norm) AS norm FROM inner_temp_sensor_info itsi LEFT JOIN inner_temp_sensor its ON itsi.inner_temp_sensor_id = its.id LEFT JOIN pouring_base pb ON pb.small_sb_id = its.sb_id LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin ssb on ssb.id = its.sb_id WHERE pb.close_time <= now() and ssb.ds_start<28 AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m'), date_format(itsi.time, '%Y%m') ) = 1 GROUP BY its.sb_id, itsi.time ) t1 GROUP BY t1.small_sb_no ) t1 ) tb2
